Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Bairnsdale International in Bairnsdale, you'll be minutes from Bairnsdale Historical Museum and Bairnsdale Aquatic and Recreation Centre. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of McLeod's Morass Wildlife Reserve and Nicholson St. Gallery.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 50 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as a spa tub and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Bairnsdale International in Bairnsdale, you'll be minutes from Bairnsdale Historical Museum and Bairnsdale Aquatic and Recreation Centre. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of McLeod's Morass Wildlife Reserve and Nicholson St. Gallery.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bairnsdale Historical Museum - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Bairnsdale Aquatic and Recreation Centre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
McLeod's Morass Wildlife Reserve - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Nicholson St. Gallery - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Eggshell Dell and Gallery - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Robb Street Gallery - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi

The preferred airport for Bairnsdale International is Melbourne, VIC (MEL-Tullamarine) - 243.9 km / 151.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
